page.title: 16Education Letham.
page.content: The school has its own kitchen with a cook and a server. The dining room is also used for Music and Television. As the school has no hall, it has the use of the Games Hall at nearby Melville House on a Thursday afternoon. During the summer months, we play games on their huge playing field and we also hold our sports there. The school has an active Parent-Teacher Association. Some of the members come into school to read stories and help with Cycling Proficiency training. The school chaplain visits on Friday afternoons and conducts a short assembly.
